scripts.start-sandbox: docker run --rm --name taquitest-sandbox --detach -p 20000:20000 tqtezos/flextesa:20210216 edobox start
scripts.restart-sandbox: npm run kill-sandbox && npm run start-sandbox
scripts.start-test-sandbox: docker run --rm --name taquitest-sandbox --detach -p 20000:20000 tqtezos/flextesa:20210216 flextesarl mini-network --protocol-kind Edo --until-level 69 --add-bootstrap-account alice,tz1VSUr8wwNhLAzempoch5d6hLRiTh8Cjcjb,edpkvGfYw3LyB1UcCahKQk4rF2tvbMUk8GFiTuMjL75uGXrpvKXhjn,unencrypted:edsk3QoqBuvdamxouPhin7swCvkQNgq4jP5KZPbwWNnwdZpSpJiEbq@2_000_000_000_000 --add-bootstrap-account bob,tz1aSkwEot3L2kmUvcoxzjMomb9mvBNuzFK6,edpkurPsQ8eUApnLUJ9ZPDvu98E8VNj4KtJa1aZr16Cr5ow5VHKnz4,unencrypted:edsk3RFfvaFaxbHx8BMtEW1rKQcPtDML3LXjNqMNLCzC3wLC1bWbAt@2_000_000_000_000
